name: The Cult: Blood Sisters
description:
DESCRIPTION

You and your sister visit an abandoned house. Strange events happen and you end up being separated. You have to solve mysteries separately to reach the end together.

COMMANDS

  • WASD or ARROW: move
  • F: turn on/of the lighter
  • ENTER or SPACE: interact with objects and doors

GAME MADE UNDER ONE WEEK FOR GDEVELOP GAME JAM.

MAY CONTAIN BUGS.

By: André Holtz and Willian Holtz
